column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " Assuming the fabulous bending brothers can hold their ground until the next round . "
#Text=Announcer says : " Round one goes to the Golden Temple Tigerdillos ! "

#Text= Shiro Shinobi says : " The Fire Ferrets are knocked into zone two and the Tigerdillos advance !

column1: #Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " The Fire Ferrets cinch the round in the closing seconds !
#Text=It 's one apiece , still anyone 's match as we go into the third and final round !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Hasook stumbles , and now he tumbles right into his teammate !
#Text=He and Bolin better untangle quick if they do n't want to ... oh , too late !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " It 's all up to Mako now !
#Text=If Mako 's knocked out , the Ferrets ' fabulous season is over !
#Text=He is dancing on the edge of the ring , surviving the three on one barrage !
#Text=It seems his plan is to let the Tigerdillos punch themselves out !
#Text=They 've got nothing left in the tank and Mako is on the offensive !
#Text=Scratch that , it 's one on one , and it 's an earth and fire slllugfest !
#Text=There 's so much smoke and dust from the firefight , I ca n't even see where the Fire Ferret is !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " It 's a knockout !
#Text=What a wing - dinger of a hat trick , folks !
#Text=Mako pulls off the upset of the season , winning the match for the Fire Ferrets !
#Text=One more win and we 're in the championship tournament !
#Text=" Korra says : " What did I think ?
#Text=" Mako says : " You did more harm than good out there .
#Text=" Hasook says : " We won , did n't we ?
#Text=" Hasook says : " Get off my case , pal !
#Text=" Korra says : " You guys were incredible out there !
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , you 're still here ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , you 're still a jerk ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Anyway , I 've been immersed in bending my entire life , but I never learned how to move like that !
#Text=It 's like there 's a whole new style here !
#Text=Think you could show me a few tricks ?
#Text=Yeah , I could show you the basics .
#Text=I 'm just not sure how my earthbending would translate to your waterbending , but we 'll figure it out .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wo n't be a problem .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm sorry , no , no !
#Text='Cause I , you know , I was just figuring ... with your Water Tribe getup ... that you are ... a Water Tribe ... gal .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're the Avatar , and I 'm an idiot .
